fcb_fab_flexible_title: 2+N+2, 3+N+3, 4+N+4 Stacked Microvia HDI PCB Manufacturing for Embedded Solutions
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_title: Overview of HDI PCB Manufacturing at PCBONLINE
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_zero: HDI PCBs, or microvia PCBs, are high-density-interconnect printed circuit boards with blind microvias, fine traces, and sequential lamination structures. HDI PCBs have at least four layers, and besides the blind vias, there are often buried microvias.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_one: PCBONLINE, an HDI PCB manufacturer since 1999, manufactures and assembles HDI PCBs with HDI stackups 1+N+1, 2+N+2, 3+N+3, 4+N+4 at one stop.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_two: PCBONLINE has 3000m² of HDI PCB manufacturing capability per day. We are dedicated to providing end-to-end HDI PCB solutions, from the initial idea to high-volume production. HDI PCB manufacturing at PBONLINE meets every technical requirement and with top cost-effectiveness.
fcb_fab_flexible_advantages_bottom_word_: • Microvias in HDI PCBs can be single, staggered, stacked, and skipped.
• HDI technology decreases products' overall size and improves electrical performance.
• HDI PCBs are suitable for products where electrical performance and noise rejection are of utmost importance.
• HDI PCBs have great impedance control and impressive high-frequency transmission capabilities.
• HDI PCBs offer a perfect solution for fine pitch packages, flip-chip assemblies, and complicated BGA designs.
• Applications include automotive, industrial, communication electronics, LEDs, control, microsystems, etc.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_title: HDI PCB Manufacturing Strengths at PCBONLINE
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_one: ◆ PCBONLINE has the HDI capabilities of manufacturing HDI PCBs 4+N+4 with stacked microvias of any layers.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_two: ◆ Microvia and mechanical via drilling for HDI PCBs: minimum laser drill diameter 0.075mm, minimum mechanical drill diameter 0.15mm.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_three: ◆ At PCBONLINE, different layer connections are available using blind vias and buried vias.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_four: ◆ Manufacture HDI PCBs with structures of 100µm and 125µm, varying copper thickness.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_five: ◆ PCBONLINE's precise and controllable mechanical deep drilling completes HDI technological possibilities.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_six: ◆ Achieve complex HDI PCBs, inlay boards, heavy copper designs, hybrid and fine structure lay-ups.

fcb_fab_flexible_related_title: Other Users Are Also Getting a Quote to Related Products
fcb_fab_flexible_related_rigid_word: Aluminum PCBs are an excellent choice for applications that require high power dissipations while maintaining high quality circuit functionality. These PCBs are perfect for automotive and power electronics, designs that are thermally sensitive, and any other application where the dissipation and handling of heat is important.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_tick_word: Ceramic PCBs are an alternative solution for designs that need to transfer heat effectively while also being less expensive than Aluminum PCBs. Ceramic PCBs are the ideal solution for devices that require high temperature cycles while maintaining a low overall cost.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_multilayer_word: Multilayer PCBs allow you to save space and size of your designs by increasing the number of layers of copper in your design. Multilayer PCBs are highly versatile and are common place with modern manufacturing technologies.
